channel.title: AP News - US News

item.title: Harris and Walz are showing their support for organized labor with appearance at Detroit union hall
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, are showing their support for organized labor by appearing at a Detroit-area union hall.

item.title: On Long Island, Republicans defend an unlikely stronghold as races could tip control of Congress
item.description: Itâ€™s a 2024 election battleground where millions of dollars are being spent and some of the biggest names in American politics are sure to pop up.

item.title: Populist conservative and ex-NBA player Royce White shakes up US Senate primary race in Minnesota
item.description: Populist conservative and ex-NBA player Royce White has shaken up a U.S. Senate primary race in Minnesota.
